titleStmt.title: Select observations of the incomparable Sir Walter Raleigh relating to trade, commerce, and coin, as it was presented to King James : wherein is proved that our money, our sea and land commodities serve to enrich and strengthen other countries against our own ...
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.S., and are to be sold by R. Baldwin ...,
